faq.question: Can I combine two or more product photos into one?
faq.answer: Yes, simply upload your images and let the AI merge them into a single frame.

faq.question: Is this tool good for agency or catalog shoots?
faq.answer: Absolutely! It’s built for agencies needing fast, high-quality merged product visuals.

faq.question: Do I need to sign in or pay?
faq.answer: No. This tool is 100% free to use, with no login required and no watermark.
